permissions: Admins can delete lineups. Non-admins can delete lineups for a customer if they are a customer manager for that customer (considering broker context) or if they manage laborers on job production plans tied to the lineup.
side_effects: Deletes the lineup and may also delete associated lineup dispatches that have no dispatch shifts.
validation_notes: The lineup ID argument is required. --confirm is required to delete. Deletion is blocked if the lineup is associated with lineup dispatch shifts, job production plans, or job schedule shifts.
